title: Tesla Cybertruck lands on Mars and picks up the Curiosity rover on its 6' bed
tuit: The build quality was up to Tesla standards, so now there are two defunct machines just sitting on the red planet

title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: They have already declared independence and established themselves as a sovereign planetary nation. They grow up so fast!

title: Tesla FSD finally makes driving obsolete. After years of delay, Tesla Full Self Driving can drive you to work while you work, play, or sleep
tuit: We killed a number of urban planners to make this dream a reality. Now you will never have to interact with another human again! Will your children have any autonomy in their hellish suburban prisons? Probably not! Stay in your cold metal box and do not meet your neighbors :)
